main event: A possible unidentified aerial object was observed moving east to west, with a red and white color, and exhibiting unusual flight characteristics.
interesting points: One red object went out of sight to the west and then came back again.
The object seemed to be on or below the ground at times.
The observer was unsure if the object was an aircraft, and thought it might have been an orbital object.
Multiple agencies were contacted, including Lockheed Flight Service, the local air force base, and other aviation authorities, but no one could definitively identify the object.
The sighting occurred over a 2-hour period from around 0100Z to 0300Z, with the visibility being described as critical.
sighted object: a red and white object moving erratically in the sky
